column4: hey there, I have a 1TB hdd on my server computer, I right click properties, it shows "used 105gb, free 765gb, there should be more free space than that surely, is there a limit to how much the file manager can "see"  ?
you are seeing it right... it is not limitation of the file manager
in your console, type "df" it will give you the right information (you are missing swap partition i blv)
